articles.author: Developer DAO (ğŸ§±, ğŸš€)
articles.description:
RTâ€‚Yannick Folla | yfolla.eth
The state of NFT data storage is insanely bullish for decentralized storage and @ArweaveTeam. There is such a big opportunity for NFTs to move off centralized storage and onto permanent and persistent storage
NiftyTable:â€‚1/ Fact: Billions of dollars worth of NFTs use centralised servers to store their data and are at risk of 'breaking' if those servers go down.
I wrote an article comparing the options for NFT data storage and crunching the stats on each method's adoption.
â€‚https://thecontrol.co/the-state-of-nft-data-storage-c471c1af58d5
